__TOC__

=== Biography ===
Born and raised in Indonesia. In 2007, he moved and settled in the Gulf State of Qatar. From 2007 up to mid-2009, he was an active member in several open source and security communities based in Indonesia, Gulf, and the UK. He was also involved in developing a number of Java-based applications in Sourceforge from 2009 until 2010. However, in recent years, Muhammad has been more involved in religious communities and busy with his studies in international and middle eastern politics. 

=== Contributions ===
* Distributor for Ubuntu CDs and DVDs in Qatar (2007-2009).  
* Translator of Ubuntu and some its applications into Bahasa Indonesia in Rosetta (2007-2008).
* Member of Ubuntu LoCo Team Indonesia (No more active!).
* Member of <nowiki>[[http://qglug.org|Qatar GNU/Linux User Group]]</nowiki>
